text: Ia arazir kurabagh amir gumaziba bagh gan, me afiar atiabar mɨn arazir mɨzɨrɨzibagh ami. Gumazir kaba ghaze, e bar Israelɨn arazimɨn gɨn mangɨ uan mɨkarziba aghorɨva dagh asɨghasɨgham.(3:2) Gumazir maba ti gumazamizibav mɨgɨa ghaze, dughiar me Kraisɨn anavɨn otozim, me Israelɨn arazibar gɨn mangɨva, gumaziba uan mɨkarzir mogomebar iniba aghoram. Pol bar gumazir kabar mɨgɨrɨgɨar kamɨn aghua, egha kamaghɨn Filipaiba deravɨra me bagh ganasa mɨgɨrɨgɨar gavgavim me ganɨngi.
